00037 // transaction is finished
00038 if (isset($_POST['finish'])) {
00039     // create circulation object
00040     $memberID = $_SESSION['memberID'];
00041     $circulation = new circulation($dbs, $memberID);
00042     // finish loan transaction
00043     $flush = $circulation->finishLoanSession();
00044     if ($flush == TRANS_FLUSH_ERROR) {
00045         // write log
00046         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'member', $memberID, 'circulation', 'ERROR : '.$_SESSION['realname'].' FAILED finish circulation transaction with member ('.$memberID.')');
00047         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00048         echo 'alert(\''.__('ERROR! Loan data can\'t be saved to database').'\');';
00049         echo '</script>';
00050     } else {
00051         // write log
00052         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'member', $memberID, 'circulation', $_SESSION['realname'].' finish circulation transaction with member ('.$memberID.')');
00053         // send message
00054         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00055         echo 'alert(\''.__('Transaction finished').'\');';
00056         echo 'parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'circulation/index.php\', \'post\', \'finishID='.$memberID.'\');';
00057         echo '</script>';
00058     }
00059     exit();
00060 }

00063 // return and extend process
00064 if (isset($_POST['process']) AND isset($_POST['loanID'])) {
00065     $loanID = intval($_POST['loanID']);
00066     // get loan data
00067     $loan_q = $dbs->query('SELECT item_code FROM loan WHERE loan_id='.$loanID);
00068     $loan_d = $loan_q->fetch_row();
00069     // create circulation object
00070     $circulation = new circulation($dbs, $_SESSION['memberID']);
00071     if ($_POST['process'] == 'return') {
00072         $return_status = $circulation->returnItem($loanID);
00073         // write log
00074         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'member', $_SESSION['memberID'], 'circulation', $_SESSION['realname'].' return item '.$loan_d[0].' for member ('.$_SESSION['memberID'].')');
00075         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00076         if ($circulation->loan_have_overdue) {
00077             echo "\n".'alert(\''.__('Overdue fines inserted to fines database').'\');'."\n";
00078         }
00079         if ($return_status === ITEM_RESERVED) {
00080             echo 'location.href = \'loan_list.php?reserveAlert='.urlencode($loan_d[0]).'\';';
00081         } else { echo 'location.href = \'loan_list.php\';'; }
00082         echo '</script>';
00083     } else {
00084         // set holiday settings
00085         $circulation->holiday_dayname = $_SESSION['holiday_dayname'];
00086         $circulation->holiday_date = $_SESSION['holiday_date'];
00087         $extend_status = $circulation->extendItemLoan($loanID);
00088         if ($extend_status === ITEM_RESERVED) {
00089             echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00090             echo 'alert(\''.__('Item CANNOT BE Extended! This Item is being reserved by other member').'\');';
00091             echo 'location.href = \'loan_list.php\';';
00092             echo '</script>';
00093         } else {
00094             // write log
00095             utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'member', $_SESSION['memberID'], 'circulation', $_SESSION['realname'].' extend loan for item '.$loan_d[0].' for member ('.$_SESSION['memberID'].')');
00096             echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00097             echo 'alert(\''.__('Loan Extended').'\');';
00098             if ($circulation->loan_have_overdue) {
00099                 echo "\n".'alert(\''.__('Overdue fines inserted to fines database').'\');'."\n";
00100             }
00101             echo 'location.href = \'loan_list.php\';';
00102             echo '</script>';
00103         }
00104     }
00105     exit();
00106 }

00109 // add temporary item to session
00110 if (isset($_POST['tempLoanID'])) {
00111     // create circulation object
00112     $circulation = new circulation($dbs, $_SESSION['memberID']);
00113     // set holiday settings
00114     $circulation->holiday_dayname = $_SESSION['holiday_dayname'];
00115     $circulation->holiday_date = $_SESSION['holiday_date'];
00116     // add item to loan session
00117     $add = $circulation->addLoanSession($_POST['tempLoanID']);
00118     if ($add == LOAN_LIMIT_REACHED) {
00119         echo '<html>';
00120         echo '<body>';
00121         if ($sysconf['loan_limit_override']) {
00122             // hidden form holding item code
00123             echo '<form method="post" name="overrideForm" action="'.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'circulation/circulation_action.php"><input type="hidden" name="overrideID" value="'.$_POST['tempLoanID'].'" /></form>';
00124             echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00125             echo 'var confOverride = confirm(\''.__('Loan Limit Reached!').'\' + "\n" + \''.__('Do You Want To Overide This?').'\');';
00126             echo 'if (confOverride) { ';
00127             echo 'document.overrideForm.submit();';
00128             echo '} else { self.location.href = \'loan.php\';}';
00129             echo '</script>';
00130         } else {
00131             echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00132             echo 'alert(\''.__('Loan Limit Reached!').'\');';
00133             echo 'location.href = \'loan.php\';';
00134             echo '</script>';
00135         }
00136         echo '</body>';
00137         echo '</html>';
00138         exit();
00139     } else if ($add == ITEM_RESERVED) {
00140         // hidden form holding item code
00141         echo '<html>';
00142         echo '<body>';
00143         echo '<form method="post" name="overrideForm" action="'.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'circulation/circulation_action.php">';
00144         echo '<input type="hidden" name="overrideID" value="'.$_POST['tempLoanID'].'" /></form>';
00145         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00146         echo 'var confOverride = confirm(\''.__('WARNING! This Item is reserved by another member').'\' + "\n" + \''.__('Do You Want To Overide This?').'\');';
00147         echo 'if (confOverride) { ';
00148         echo 'document.overrideForm.submit();';
00149         echo '} else { self.location.href = \'loan.php\';}';
00150         echo '</script>';
00151         echo '</body>';
00152         echo '</html>';
00153         exit();
00154     } else if ($add == ITEM_NOT_FOUND) {
00155         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00156         echo 'alert(\''.__('This Item is not registered in database').'\');';
00157         echo 'location.href = \'loan.php\';';
00158         echo '</script>';
00159     } else if ($add == ITEM_UNAVAILABLE) {
00160         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00161         echo 'alert(\''.__('This Item is currently not available').'\');';
00162         echo 'location.href = \'loan.php\';';
00163         echo '</script>';
00164     } else if ($add == LOAN_NOT_PERMITTED) {
00165         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00166         echo 'alert(\''.__('Loan NOT PERMITTED! Membership already EXPIRED!').'\');';
00167         echo 'location.href = \'loan.php\';';
00168         echo '</script>';
00169     } else if ($add == LOAN_NOT_PERMITTED_PENDING) {
00170         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00171         echo 'alert(\''.__('Loan NOT PERMITTED! Membership under PENDING State!').'\');';
00172         echo 'location.href = \'loan.php\';';
00173         echo '</script>';
00174     } else if ($add == ITEM_LOAN_FORBID) {
00175         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00176         echo 'alert(\''.__('Loan Forbidden for this Item!').'\');';
00177         echo 'location.href = \'loan.php\';';
00178         echo '</script>';
00179     } else {
00180         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00181         echo 'location.href = \'loan.php\';';
00182         echo '</script>';
00183     }
00184     exit();
00185 }

00188 // loan limit override
00189 if (isset($_POST['overrideID']) AND !empty($_POST['overrideID'])) {
00190     // define constant
00191     define('IGNORE_LOAN_RULES', 1);
00192     // create circulation object
00193     $circulation = new circulation($dbs, $_SESSION['memberID']);
00194     // set holiday settings
00195     $circulation->holiday_dayname = $_SESSION['holiday_dayname'];
00196     $circulation->holiday_date = $_SESSION['holiday_date'];
00197     // add item to loan session
00198     $add = $circulation->addLoanSession($_POST['overrideID']);
00199     echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00200     echo 'location.href = \'loan.php\';';
00201     echo '</script>';
00202     exit();
00203 }

00206 // remove temporary item session
00207 if (isset($_GET['removeID'])) {
00208     // create circulation object
00209     $circulation = new circulation($dbs, $_SESSION['memberID']);
00210     // remove item from loan session
00211     $circulation->removeLoanSession($_GET['removeID']);
00212     echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00213     $msg = str_replace('{removeID}', $_GET['removeID'], __('Item {removeID} removed from session')); //mfc
00214     echo 'alert(\''.$msg.'\');';
00215     echo 'location.href = \'loan.php\';';
00216     echo '</script>';
00217     exit();

00221 // quick return proccess
00222 if (isset($_POST['quickReturnID']) AND $_POST['quickReturnID']) {
00223     // get loan data
00224     $loan_info_q = $dbs->query("SELECT l.*,m.member_id,m.member_name,b.title FROM loan AS l
00225         LEFT JOIN item AS i ON i.item_code=l.item_code
00226         LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id
00227         LEFT JOIN member AS m ON l.member_id=m.member_id
00228         WHERE l.item_code='".$dbs->escape_string($_POST['quickReturnID'])."' AND is_lent=1 AND is_return=0");
00229     if ($loan_info_q->num_rows < 1) {
00230         echo '<div class="errorBox">'.__('This is item already returned or not exists in loan database').'</div>';
00231     } else {
00232         $return_date = date('Y-m-d');
00233         // get data
00234         $loan_d = $loan_info_q->fetch_assoc();
00235         // create circulation object
00236         $circulation = new circulation($dbs, $loan_d['member_id']);
00237         // check for overdue
00238         $overdue = $circulation->countOverdueValue($loan_d['loan_id'], $return_date);
00239         // check overdue
00240         if ($overdue) {
00241             $msg = str_replace('{overdueDays}', $overdue['days'],__('OVERDUED for {overdueDays} days(s) with fines value of')); //mfc
00242             $loan_d['title'] .= '<div style="color: red; font-weight: bold;">'.$msg.$overdue['value'].'</div>';
00243         }
00244         // return item
00245         $return_status = $circulation->returnItem($loan_d['loan_id']);
00246         if ($return_status === ITEM_RESERVED) {
00247             // get reservation data
00248             $reserve_q = $dbs->query('SELECT r.member_id, m.member_name
00249                 FROM reserve AS r
00250                 LEFT JOIN member AS m ON r.member_id=m.member_id
00251                 WHERE item_code=\''.$loan_d['item_code'].'\' ORDER BY reserve_date DESC');
00252             $reserve_d = $reserve_q->fetch_row();
00253             $member = $reserve_d[1].' ('.$reserve_d[0].')';
00254             $reserve_msg = str_replace(array('{itemCode}', '{member}'), array($loan_d['item_code'], $member), __('Item {itemCode} is being reserved by member {member}')); //mfc
00255             $loan_d['title'] .= '<div>'.$reserve_msg.'</div>';
00256         }
00257         // write log
00258         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'member', $loan_d['member_id'], 'circulation', $_SESSION['realname'].' return item ('.$_POST['quickReturnID'].') with title ('.$loan_d['title'].') with Quick Return method');
00259         // show loan information
00260         include SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00261         // create table object
00262         $table = new simbio_table();
00263         $table->table_attr = 'class="border" style="width: 100%; margin-bottom: 5px;" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00264         // append data to table row
00265         $table->appendTableRow(array('Item '.$_POST['quickReturnID'].__(' successfully returned on').$return_date)); //mfc
00266         $table->appendTableRow(array(__('Title'), $loan_d['title']));
00267         $table->appendTableRow(array(__('Member Name'), $loan_d['member_name'], __('Member ID'), $loan_d['member_id']));
00268         $table->appendTableRow(array(__('Loan Date'), $loan_d['loan_date'], __('Due Date'), $loan_d['due_date']));
00269         // set the cell attributes
00270         $table->setCellAttr(1, null, 'class="dataListHeader" style="color: #FFFFFF; font-weight: bold;" colspan="4"');
00271         $table->setCellAttr(2, 0, 'class="alterCell"');
00272         $table->setCellAttr(2, 1, 'class="alterCell2" colspan="3"');
00273         $table->setCellAttr(3, 0, 'class="alterCell" width="15%"');
00274         $table->setCellAttr(3, 1, 'class="alterCell2" width="35%"');
00275         $table->setCellAttr(3, 2, 'class="alterCell" width="15%"');
00276         $table->setCellAttr(3, 3, 'class="alterCell2" width="35%"');
00277         $table->setCellAttr(4, 0, 'class="alterCell" width="15%"');
00278         $table->setCellAttr(4, 1, 'class="alterCell2" width="35%"');
00279         $table->setCellAttr(4, 2, 'class="alterCell" width="15%"');
00280         $table->setCellAttr(4, 3, 'class="alterCell2" width="35%"');
00281         // print out the table
00282         echo $table->printTable();
00283     }
00284     exit();
00285 }

00288 // add reservation
00289 if (isset($_POST['reserveItemID'])) {
00290     $item_id = trim($_POST['reserveItemID']);
00291     if (!$item_id) {
00292         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00293         echo 'alert(\''.__('NO DATA Selected to reserve!').'\');';
00294         echo 'location.href = \'reserve_list.php\';';
00295         echo '</script>';
00296         die();
00297     }
00298     // get reservation limit from member type
00299     $reserve_limit_q = $dbs->query('SELECT reserve_limit FROM mst_member_type WHERE member_type_id='.(integer)$_SESSION['memberTypeID']);
00300     $reserve_limit_d = $reserve_limit_q->fetch_row();
00301     // get current reservation data for this member
00302     $current_reserve_q = $dbs->query('SELECT COUNT(reserve_id) FROM reserve WHERE member_id=\''.trim($_SESSION['memberID']).'\'');
00303     $current_reserve_d = $current_reserve_q->fetch_row();
00304     if ($current_reserve_d[0] >= $reserve_limit_d[0]) {
00305         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00306         echo 'alert(\''.__('Can not add more reservation. Maximum limit reached').'\');';
00307         echo 'location.href = \'reserve_list.php\';';
00308         echo '</script>';
00309         die();
00310     }
00311 
00312     // get biblio data for this item
00313     $biblio_q = $dbs->query('SELECT i.biblio_id, ist.rules FROM biblio AS b
00314         LEFT JOIN item AS i ON b.biblio_id=i.biblio_id
00315         LEFT JOIN mst_item_status AS ist ON i.item_status_id=ist.item_status_id
00316         WHERE i.item_code=\''.$dbs->escape_string($item_id).'\'');
00317     $biblio_d = $biblio_q->fetch_row();
00318     // check if this item is forbidden
00319     if (!empty($biblio_d[1])) {
00320         $arr_rules = @unserialize($biblio_d[1]);
00321         if ($arr_rules) {
00322             if (in_array(NO_LOAN_TRANSACTION, $arr_rules)) {
00323                 echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00324                 echo 'alert(\''.__('Can\'t reserve this Item. Loan Forbidden!').'\');';
00325                 echo 'location.href = \'reserve_list.php\';';
00326                 echo '</script>';
00327                 die();
00328             }
00329         }
00330     }
00331     // get the availability status
00332     $avail_q = $dbs->query('SELECT COUNT(l.loan_id) FROM loan AS l
00333         WHERE l.item_code=\''.$item_id.'\' AND l.is_lent=1 AND l.is_return=0 AND l.member_id!=\''.$_SESSION['memberID'].'\'');
00334     $avail_d = $avail_q->fetch_row();
00335     if ($avail_d[0] > 0) {
00336         // write log
00337         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'member', $_SESSION['memberID'], 'circulation', $_SESSION['realname'].' reserve item '.$item_id.' for member ('.$_SESSION['memberID'].')');
00338         // add reservation to database
00339         $reserve_date = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00340         $dbs->query('INSERT INTO reserve(member_id, biblio_id, item_code, reserve_date) VALUES (\''.$_SESSION['memberID'].'\', \''.$biblio_d[0].'\', \''.$item_id.'\', \''.$reserve_date.'\')');
00341         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00342         echo 'alert(\''.__('Reservation added').'\');';
00343         echo 'location.href = \'reserve_list.php\';';
00344         echo '</script>';
00345     } else {
00346         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00347         echo 'alert(\''.__('Item for this title is already available or already on hold by this member!').'\');';
00348         echo 'location.href = \'reserve_list.php\';';
00349         echo '</script>';
00350     }
00351     exit();
00352 }

00355 // remove reservation item
00356 if (isset($_POST['reserveID']) AND !empty($_POST['reserveID'])) {
00357     $reserveID = intval($_POST['reserveID']);
00358     // get reserve data
00359     $reserve_q = $dbs->query('SELECT item_code FROM reserve WHERE reserve_id='.$reserveID);
00360     $reserve_d = $reserve_q->fetch_row();
00361     // delete reservation record from database
00362     $dbs->query('DELETE FROM reserve WHERE reserve_id='.$reserveID);
00363     // write log
00364     utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'member', $_SESSION['memberID'], 'circulation', $_SESSION['realname'].' remove reservation for item '.$reserve_d[0].' for member ('.$_SESSION['memberID'].')');
00365     echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00366     echo 'alert(\''.__('Reservation removed').'\');';
00367     echo 'location.href = \'reserve_list.php\';';
00368     echo '</script>';
00369     exit();
00370 }

00372 
00373 // removing fines
00374 if (isset($_POST['removeFines'])) {
00375     foreach ($_POST['removeFines'] as $fines_id) {
00376         $fines_id = intval($fines_id);
00377         // change loan data
00378         $dbs->query("DELETE FROM fines WHERE fines_id=$fines_id");
00379     }
00380     echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00381     echo 'alert(\''.__('Fines data removed').'\');';
00382     echo 'location.href = \'fines_list.php\';';
00383     echo '</script>';
00384     exit();
00385 }

00387 
00388 // transaction is started
00389 if (isset($_POST['memberID']) OR isset($_SESSION['memberID'])) {
00390     // create member object
00391     // if there is already member ID session
00392     if (isset($_SESSION['memberID'])) {
00393         $memberID = trim($_SESSION['memberID']);
00394     } else {
00395         // new transaction proccess
00396         // clear previous sessions
00397         $_SESSION['temp_loan'] = array();
00398         $memberID = trim(preg_replace('@\s*(<.+)$@i', '', $_POST['memberID']));
00399         // write log
00400         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'member', $memberID, 'circulation', $_SESSION['realname'].' start transaction with member ('.$memberID.')');
00401     }
00402     $member = new member($dbs, $memberID);
00403     if (!$member->valid()) {
00404         # echo '<div class="errorBox">Member ID '.$memberID.' not valid (unregistered in database)</div>';
00405         echo '<div class="errorBox">'.__('Member ID').' '.$memberID.' '.__(' not valid (unregistered in database)').'</div>'; //mfc
00406     } else {
00407         // get member information
00408         $member_type_d = $member->getMemberTypeProp();
00409         // member type ID
00410         $_SESSION['memberTypeID'] = $member->member_type_id;
00411         // save member ID to the sessions
00412         $_SESSION['memberID'] = $member->member_id;
00413         // create renewed/reborrow session array
00414         $_SESSION['reborrowed'] = array();
00415         // check membership expire
00416         $_SESSION['is_expire'] = $member->isExpired();
00417         // check if membership is blacklisted
00418         $_SESSION['is_pending'] = $member->isPending();
00419         // set HTML buttons disable flag
00420         $disabled = '';
00421         $add_style = '';
00422         // check for expire date and pending state
00423         if ($_SESSION['is_expire'] OR $_SESSION['is_pending']) {
00424             $disabled = ' disabled ';
00425             $add_style = ' color: #999999; border-color: #CCCCCC;';
00426         }
00427         // show the member information
00428         echo '<table width="100%" class="border" style="margin-bottom: 5px;" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0">'."\n";
00429         echo '<tr>'."\n";
00430         echo '<td class="dataListHeader" colspan="5">';
00431         // hidden form for transaction finish
00432         echo '<form id="finishForm" method="post" target="blindSubmit" action="'.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'circulation/circulation_action.php" style="display: inline;"><input type="button" value="'.__('Finish Transaction').'" onclick="confSubmit(\'finishForm\', \''.__('Are you sure want to finish current transaction?').'\')" /><input type="hidden" name="finish" value="true" /></form>';
00433         echo '</td>';
00434         echo '</tr>'."\n";
00435         echo '<tr>'."\n";
00436         echo '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>'.__('Member Name').'</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" width="30%">'.$member->member_name.'</td>';
00437         echo '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>'.__('Member ID').'</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" width="30%">'.$member->member_id.'</td>';
00438         // member photo
00439         if ($member->member_image) {
00440             if (file_exists(IMAGES_BASE_DIR.'persons/'.$member->member_image)) {
00441                 echo '<td class="alterCell2" valign="top" rowspan="3">';
00442                 echo '<img src="'.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'lib/phpthumb/phpThumb.php?src=../../images/persons/'.urlencode($member->member_image).'&w=53" style="border: 1px solid #999999" />';
00443                 echo '</td>';
00444             }
00445         }
00446         echo '</tr>'."\n";
00447         echo '<tr>'."\n";
00448         echo '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>'.__('Member Email').'</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" width="30%">'.$member->member_email.'</td>';
00449         echo '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>'.__('Member Type').'</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" width="30%">'.$member->member_type_name.'</td>';
00450         echo '</tr>'."\n";
00451         echo '<tr>'."\n";
00452         echo '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>'.__('Register Date').'</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" width="30%">'.$member->register_date.'</td>';
00453         // give notification about expired membership and pending
00454         $expire_msg = '';
00455         if ($_SESSION['is_expire']) {
00456             $expire_msg .= '<font style="color: #FF0000;">('.__('Membership Already Expired').')</font>';
00457         }
00458         echo '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>'.__('Expiry Date').'</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" width="30%">'.$member->expire_date.' '.$expire_msg.'</td>';
00459         echo '</tr>'."\n";
00460         // member notes and pending information
00461         if (!empty($member->member_notes) OR $_SESSION['is_pending']) {
00462             echo '<tr>'."\n";
00463             echo '<td class="alterCell" width="15%"><strong>Notes</strong></td><td class="alterCell2" colspan="4">';
00464             if ($member->member_notes) {
00465                 echo '<div>'.$member->member_notes.'</div>';
00466             }
00467             if ($_SESSION['is_pending']) {
00468                 echo '<div style="color: #FF0000;">('.__('Membership currently in pending state, loan transaction is locked.').')</div>';
00469             }
00470             echo '</td>';
00471             echo '</tr>'."\n";
00472         }
00473         echo '</table>'."\n";
00474         // tab and iframe
00475         echo '<input type="button" style="width: 19%;'.$add_style.'" class="tab" value="'.__('Loans').'" onclick="setIframeContent(\'listsFrame\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'circulation/loan.php\'); setTabClass(this);" '.$disabled.' />';
00476         echo '<input type="button" style="width: 19%;" class="tab tabSelected" value="'.__('Current Loans').'" onclick="setIframeContent(\'listsFrame\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'circulation/loan_list.php\'); setTabClass(this);" />';
00477         if ($member_type_d['enable_reserve']) {
00478             echo '<input type="button" style="width: 19%;'.$add_style.'" class="tab" value="'.__('Reserve').'" onclick="setIframeContent(\'listsFrame\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'circulation/reserve_list.php\'); setTabClass(this);" '.$disabled.' />';
00479         }
00480         echo '<input type="button" style="width: 19%;" class="tab" value="'.__('Fines').'" onclick="setIframeContent(\'listsFrame\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'circulation/fines_list.php\'); setTabClass(this);" />';
00481         echo '<input type="button" style="width: 19%;" class="tab" value="'.__('Loan History').'" onclick="setIframeContent(\'listsFrame\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'circulation/member_loan_hist.php\'); setTabClass(this);" /><br />'."\n";
00482         echo '<iframe src="modules/circulation/loan_list.php" id="listsFrame" class="border" style="width: 100%; height: 300px;"></iframe>'."\n";
00483         echo '<div class="objectDragger" id="iframeDragger">&nbsp;</div>'."\n";
00484         echo '<script type="text/javascript">registerDraggerEvent(\'iframeDragger\', \'listsFrame\');</script>'."\n";
00485     }
00486     exit();
00487 }
